snippet: “The Story of Film: An Odyssey” traces the history of cinema in 15 hours. An epic in itself, it is playing at the Museum of Modern Art.
abstract: A O Scott Critic's Notebook discusses the eight-part documentary The Story of Film: An Odyssey, directed and narrated by Irish film critic Mark Cousins.
lead_paragraph: “The Story of Film: An Odyssey” traces the history of cinema in 15 hours. An epic in itself, it is playing at the Museum of Modern Art.

headline.seo: ‘The Story of Film: An Odyssey,’ by Mark Cousins, at MoMA
headline.main: Your Film of Films: A Sweeping History of an Art
headline.print_headline: Your Film of Films: A Sweeping History of an Art
